Koba

Live examples

Backbone model live example

HTML:

1<script type='text/html' id='tmpl-demo-model'>
2    <p>First name: <input data-bind='value: firstName, valueUpdate: "keyup"' /></p>
3    <p>Last name: <input data-bind='value: lastName, valueUpdate: "keyup"' /></p>
4    <h2>Hello, <span data-bind='text: firstName() + " " + lastName()'></span>!</h2>
5</script>
6<div id='content-demo-model' class='demo'></div>

Javascript:

 1var myModel = new Backbone.Model({
 2    firstName: "John",
 3    lastName: "Smith"
 4});
 5var MyView = koba.View.extend({
 6    el: '#content-demo-model',
 7    render: function() {
 8        this.$el.html("<div id='my-view' data-bind='template: {name: \"tmpl-demo-model\"}'></div>");
 9        myView.bindData();
10    }
11});
12var myView = new MyView({data: myModel});
13myView.render();
